text: Astrid North (born Astrid Karina North Radmann; 24 August 1973 â€“ 25 June 2019) was a German soul singer and songwriter. She was the singer of the German band . She released five albums with them. She was also a guest singer of the band for which she published three albums. North was born in Berlin. North died on 25 June 2019 from pancreatic cancer in Berlin, aged 45. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1973 births Category:2019 deaths Category:German singer-songwriters Category:Singers from Berlin Category:Writers from Berlin
title: Astrid North
